name: Far Cry 1 | Database
description:
Far Cry 2004 BASE

Here is database for modders of Far Cry Community.

Database including: usefull tools for modding, maps, mods etc....

Platforms: Windows
Developer: CryTek
Publisher:  Ubisoft
Engine: CryEngine
Homepage: CryTek

Release date: 2004 year 23 march

Tools  Tutorials Articles Patches Images Assets

Before activity, please, read the rules of the itch io platform first: RULES
We not supporting illegal and commercial projects. All modding stuff is non commercial here(copyright law above all else): EULA - READ
All open source here is a legal CryTek's SDK.
We are not official CryTek's support. We are united modders who keep the activity for this game on itch.io forum. This page - is a forum for saving useful tools and information about the game, and the way to share experience.

Users are available to create here own topics to discuss about the game or share some experience with modding. 

You can also check info about MULTIPLAYER

This page is W.I.P.
